mean_en: a series of three novels, movies, etc., that are closely related and involve the same characters or themes
word_etyma: tri 三 + logy …学 → 三部曲；三部剧
short_phrase: the first volume of the trilogy
sentence: These three books are the trilogy written by a famous writer.
sentence_trans: 这三本书是一个著名作家的三部曲。
